name: Super Moist Meatloaf
author: Jessica Nichols Moseman
summary: This is a family recipe that is a big favorite at our house. By using fresh bread instead of dried bread crumbs, you get a meatloaf that is moist and delicious.
ingredients: ¾ cup small chunks of bread
½ cup chopped green bell pepper
½ cup ketchup, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Thoroughly mix ground beef, onion, eggs, bread, milk, green bell pepper, salt, sage, and black pepper together in a bowl
Spread ketchup over the top of the loaf
Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 45 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
